//Initialization
00000000
11111110
00000000
00000000
00000010
00010011    // PC = 0 	addi $a0, $r0, 0		$a0 = 0
00000000
00000000
00000100
00010011    // PC = 4	addi $t0, $r0, 0		$t0 = 0
00000000
00010000
00000100
10010011    // PC = 8	addi $t1, $r0, 1		$t1 = 1
00000000
11110000
00000101
00010011    // PC = 8	addi $t2, $r0, 15		$t2 = 15
00000000
00000000
00001000
10010011    // PC = 12	addi $s1, $r0, 0		$s1 = 0
00000000
00010000
00001001
00010011    // PC = 16	addi $s2, $r0, 1		$s2 = 1
00000000
10100010
00100000
00100011   // PC = 20	sw $t1, 0($a0)
00000000_
00000010_
00101000_
00000011    // PC = 24	lw $s0, 0($a0)
00000000
00001000
00001010
00010011    // PC = 28	addi $s4, $s0, 0
01000000_
10011000_
00001000_
00110011   // PC = 32	sub $s0, $s0, $t1      subu $s0, 1
00000001_
00101000_
10001000_
10110011   // PC = 32	add $s1, $s1, $s2
00000000
00001001_
00001001_
10010011    // PC = 36	addi $s3, $s2, 0  	   move $s3, $s2
00000000_
00001000_
10001001_
00010011    // PC = 40	addi $s2, $s1, 0	   move $s2, $s1
00000000
00001001_
10001000_
10010011    // PC = 44 	addi $s1, $s3, 0	   move $s1, $s3
00000000_
10001000_
00000100_
01100011   // PC = 48 	beq $s0, $t0, finish   bne $s0, $zero, loop
11111110_
00000000_
00000100_
11100011   // PC = 52	beq $0, $0, loop
//-------------------------------------------------------------------
00000011
00011001
00000101
10110011   //mul $t3,$s1,$s2
00000010
10111001
00000101
10110011    //mul $t3,$t3,$s1
00000000
10111001
00000110
00110011   //PC=20  add $t4,$s2,$t3
00000010
10110110
00010110
11010111 //add $t5 $t3 $t4
01000010
11000101
10000111
01010111 //sub $t6 $t3 $t4
01000010
10110110
00000101
01010111 //sub $t2 $t4 $t3
00000010
10110110
01100111
11010111 //dpr $t7 $t3 $t4
11111111
